welcome_message_body: Welcome to Sennan, Japan! Get ready to experience the charm of this coastal city, known for its beautiful beaches, delicious seafood, and traditional Japanese culture. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring and enjoying all that Sennan has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Kansai International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for low-cost carriers and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require reconnection after a certain period of time.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Itami Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Itami Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport. No registration or password is required.
